item.title: ReloadOperatingSystem.php
item.description: <?php /** * Reload Operating System * * This script reloads current operating system configuration. It pass "FORCE" as the token parameter, * in order to proceed with the reload without confirmation. * * Important manual pages: * @see http://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/services/SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest/reloadOperatingSystem * @see http://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/datatypes/SoftLayer_Container_Hardware_Server_Configuration * * @license <http://sldn.softlayer.com/wiki/index.php/license> * @author SoftLayer Technologies, Inc. <sldn@softlayer.com> */ require_once "C:/Php/SoftLayer/SoftLayer/SoapClient.class.php"; /** * Your SoftLayer API username * @var string */ $username = "set me"; /** * Your SoftLayer API key * Generate one at: https://control.
